name: Rhythm Never Dice
description:
This is a Pico-8 game built during a GMTK game jam 2022. The theme being "Roll of the Dice".

Rhythm Never Dice is a rhythm game in which you have to match the dice coming towards the goal zone.

Controls:

Arrow keys to score dice while they are in the goal zone.

N/M to select dice. More control options can be found to the right of the game in the webpage.

NOTE:

I did not really have enough time for making levels and testing them, so the balance may not be perfect.
